column7: Small eat in area or take out
column9: Friendly staff and good sushi at a reasonable price.  Miso soup is included.  Convenient location in downtown Lund.

After my favorite (unnamed) sushi place in Lund experienced severe drops in quality I decided to try out Rå Epok. I was pleasantly surprised. The sushi is good albeit not excellent. In comparison with other sushi places in Lund this one has more of a...More
Nice and cozy restaurant. Fresh and tasty sushi. Friendly service. Plus points for more enviromentally friendly choices.

During my stay in Lund I asked the locals where to have sushi and was recommended to eat at Rå Epok which they believed was one of the best places to have sushi. The restaurant is cosy decorated and since they only play local music...More
Food ok, price for lunch is a bit too pricy. Music is way too loud. Customer service could need some improvements.

This place is awesome! It's a cool take on sushi, mixing sushi with a twist of Skane. Try the roll with herring and ragknacke. The place is small, but has a cool vibe to it with graffiti on the wall and only swedish bands being...More
Ecologically aware and delicious! This is probably the best sushi I have had in Sweden. Well worth a visit!

Just dropped in for a quick solo dinner near closing. Nice sushi made with local ingredients including salmon, pike and char. Just a single table and a bit of counter space, so not great for a large party but well executed, tasty and quick.
